project.title: Node JS, React JS, MongoDB, Solidity
project.description: We in ChildFly provide a block-chain powered platform to report child labour. The reporters can track their report of inspection by a police officer, further on successful verification of the crime by the inspector, the reporters also receives a bounty or prize money in form of ethers as cryptocurrency by the administration.  The entire interactive front-end of the website is built using ReactJs, while the backend is in Node Js and MongoDB. Ganache and Metamask  is used to generate and manage test ethers and Solidity for writing code responsible for managing transfer of ethers from admin account to user account. My team secured second position among all blockchain submissions.

project.title: Flutter, Firebase, Flask, Machine Learning
project.description: I developed a web app to manage and monitor students held under quarantine. It had 2 components:- admin and security guard side to handle the data of students based on their activity. I used Firebase Cloud in S-guard and Flask API in Admin Dashboard to display the data of students. I implemented features to search, sort, and filter the list of students based on certain rules specified for quarantine. I also implemented the feature where the guard can maintain the students’ quarantine status and approve/disapprove their request based on their activities.
